steps_string:
Steps( Begin(), 
Operation(Multiply(), number_in_box(6), number_in_box(3), put_result_into_box(7)),
Put(number_in_box(2), into_box(8)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(1), 2), number_in_box(8)), then_go_to_step(7), then_go_to_step(4)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(1), 2), increase(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(7), 2), number_in_box(6)), then_go_to_step(1), then_go_to_step(6)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(7), 1), number_in_box(7)), then_go_to_step(8), then_go_to_step(1)),
Put(number_in_box(7), into_box(7)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(2), 1), increase(2)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(1), 1), increase(1)), End())
question: What number is now in Box 7?
question_zh: 经过以上操作之后，现在7号盒子中的数字是多少?
desc: Multiply: ( number in box 6 ) * ( number in box 3 ), put result into box 7.
Put ( number in box 2 ) into box 8
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 1 greater than ( number in box 8 )
Change Instruction 1: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 1
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 7 greater than ( number in box 6 )
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 7 greater than ( number in box 7 )
Put ( number in box 7 ) into box 7
Change Instruction 2: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 2
Change Instruction 1: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 1
desc_zh: 相乘：6号盒子中的数字*3号盒子中的数字，将结果放在7号盒子中。
将2号盒子中的数字放在8号盒子中
判断：指令1中第2个盒子的编号比8号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令1：将该指令中的第2个盒子的编号加1
判断：指令7中第2个盒子的编号比6号盒子中的数字大吗
判断：指令7中第1个盒子的编号比7号盒子中的数字大吗
将7号盒子中的数字放在7号盒子中
更改指令2：将该指令中的第1个盒子的编号加2
更改指令1：将该指令中的第1个盒子的编号加1
